channel.title: [PI] Teleport Names

item.title: [PI] Teleport Names
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:545760”] for(int i = 0; i < 20000; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("ID: " + i, i); } c.sendMessage("Done printing");
Use that. it’ll change all the strings to their ID’s.[/quote]

I see… Thank you so much, very much appreciate your help!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Teleport Names
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

for(int i = 0; i < 20000; i++) {
     c.getPA().sendFrame126("ID: " + i, i);
}
c.sendMessage("Done printing");

Use that. it’ll change all the strings to their ID’s.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Teleport Names
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Trying to change teleport names and descriptions on the normal spellbook. This is what I have now, but it has done nothing. Looked in ClickingButtons.java for the cases and those number didn’t work either. I feel lie I have the ID #'s wrong, how do i verify this?

[code] public void handleLoginText() {
//modern
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Monsters”, 4140); //varrock
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Training, Dungeons, Slayer”, 4141); //varrock description
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Mini-Games”, 4143); //lumbridge
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport to various mini-games”, 4144); //lumbridge description
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Bosses”, 1350); //falador
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport to your favorite boss”, 1351); //falador description
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“PKing”, 1382); //camelot
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Various PKing location”, 1383); //camelot description
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport name”, 1415); //ardougne
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Description”, 1416); //ardougne description
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Cities”, 1454); //watchtower
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport to various cities”, 1455); //watchtower description
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport name”, 7457); //trollheim
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Description”, 7458); //trollheim description
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Teleport name”, 18472); //ape atoll
//c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Description”, 18473); //ape atoll description

	//ancients
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13037); //paddewwa
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Monster Teleport", 13038); //paddewwa description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13047); //senntisten
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13048); //senntisten description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13055); //kharyll
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13056); //kharyll description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13063); //lassar
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13064); //lassar description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13071); //dareeyak
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13072); //dareeyak description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13081); //carrallanger
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13082); //carralanger description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13089); //annakarl
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13090); //annakarl description
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Teleport name", 13097); //ghorrock
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Description", 13098); //ghorrock description
	//c.getPA().sendFrame126("Monster Teleport", 1164);
}[/code]
